name: The Hellhound's Fur
description: What appears to be a small hut alone in a meadow with a steady plume of smoke coming from it's chimney stack is actually a tavern owned by the alchemist Trimarim.
The alchemical experimentations conducted over the years have left the critters here imbued with great power.

name: The Hidden Stump Inn
description: From the outside you'd never know this was here, but the inside roars with the sound of visiting adventurers and forest inhabitants.

The inside is carved from an ancient downed forest tree and extends through the roots into a small natural cave system. The caves themselves sprawl in all directions and contain powerful but wealthy critters.

name: Steamgear Tap House
description: This tavern sits in the hear of the industrious city of Rotherham.
The mostly obscured clockwork gears rotate at odd intervals as the steam hisses from various valves.

name: The Drowning Fish
description: The smell is overwhelming.

name: Wyverns Holm
description: Deep in the ruins you find a small tavern protected by ancient debre and bones that must have belonged to titans
The air is still and most are quiet. A powerful enchanted energy runs through this place.

name: Amixea's Hut
description: Amixea is a old small quiet witch who radiates with a magical aura.

name: Domari's Hut
description: Domari does not reply to your questions.
Domari looks through you.
"... bring dust..."

name: Naxxremis's Grotto
description: The cave system connecting here are a labyrinthian death maze,
Surely no outsiders could make it here...

name: Palace of Rotherham
description: A grand building with armored guards and busy nobles

name: Altar of Transcendence
description: The runestones are confusing, but the power they possess is clear.

name: Altar of Might
description: The altar is adorned with a large ruby gemstone, it seems inactive.

name: Altar of Agility
description: The altar is adorned with a large emerald gemstone, it seems inactive.

name: Altar of Magic
description: The altar is adorned with a large sapphire gemstone, it seems inactive.

name: Altar of Endurance
description: The altar is adorned with a large diamond gemstone, it seems inactive.
